name: 8 Bit Fighters
description:
This game combines legacy game elements such as side scrolling and 2D fighting games. Imagine you can perform all the 2D fighting game's stylish moves & combos on a classic side scrolling game. So download now and be the next 8-Bit fighters.

With classic side scrolling stages, awesome fighting skills and tons of unlockables, rich enemies and boss fights satisfy every hardcore gamer.

Features
- Over 20 different stages waiting for your chanllenge!
- 8 playable characters comes with different unique moves and technics!
- Upgrade your characters with new moves and technic by unlocking them!
- Editable chain combo and special moves provides infinite possibilities!
- Easy to master attack systems that suits both newbie and fighting game masters!

What are you waiting for? Be 8-Bit! Be a fighter! PLAY NOW!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
This game contains optional in-app purchases. You can disable this feature in the settings menu of your device.
